channel.title: Comments on: 2010 Goals: 4th Quarter/Year-End Review
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Richard
item.dc:creator: Richard
item.content:encoded:
Sounds like a busy year! I’m reading Windows Powershell in Action, too. It’s great so far. Lots of insight into why particular decisions were made – like backtick instead of backslash as the escape character and so forth. Typically I’m usually pretty advanced in a language before I start to learn about why the language is the way it is so this is kind of different for me.

I haven’t been this excited about a technology since I learned Perl.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: That is pretty impressive, keep it up and hopefully 2011 will even be better
item.content:encoded: That is pretty impressive, keep it up and hopefully 2011 will even be better

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Wow, this sounds like a really great year and lots of goals achieved! I wish at least 1/3rd of it for myself for next year...
item.content:encoded: Wow, this sounds like a really great year and lots of goals achieved! I wish at least 1/3rd of it for myself for next year…
